metadata.title: CVE-2024-43832 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:s390/uv: Don't call folio_wait_writeback() without a folio referencefolio_wait_writeback() requires that no spinlocks are held and thata folio reference is held, as documented. After we dropped the PTL, thefolio could get freed concurrently. So grab a temporary reference.
